packages = ['numpy'] import numpy as np selection = np.random.randint(0,100,1)[0]
from pyscript import when @when("click", selector="#submit") def Check_guess(): user_guess = int(Element("guess").value) result = Element("result") if user guess == selection: result.write("congratulations! you guessed correctly.") elif user_guess > selection: result.write("try again! your guess was to high") else: result.write("try again! your guess was to low.")
